body: @zygard is exhentai their new source? i thought it's the panda site (forgot the name)

When a book gets an update on exhentai then nhentai reuploads. 
It gets sent back to the front page on exhentai and then nhentai copy pastes it. 
Just so you guys know why this is duplicated now, it's because nhentai just copy pastes everything from there using a script and they don't care about having duplicates.
They translated the afterword. Not a reupload.
Just a fucking reupload... Only difference is that this has Big Ass tagged compared to https://nhentai.net/g/370859/
